title: All The Crown's Ashes
description: Nevervein’s King has been taken by Cadoc of Ithidora, leaving Ruby and her friends to deal with the aftermath of the situation in Nevervein.And everyone is looking to Ruby to get him back.But after losing control of her power in the hidden cave of the Shadow Forest, Ruby isn’t so sure that her magic is going to save anybody. Including Aiden, who desperately needs it.Cadoc, however, has different plans. While holding Aiden as a prisoner in his own Kingdom, He’s invited Ruby to be his guest during the infamous Blood Moon Ceremony, and it might be the only chance she has at getting close to Aiden.Except her magic is doing more than losing control. Another God has begun to reach out to Ruby, and her magic is changing into something darker with every passing day.Now, Ruby has to make the dangerous journey to the mysterious Kingdom of Ithidora, where she’ll learn what Cadoc has planned for her and Aiden.And she has to do it before anyone else gets hurt.
author: Emily Blackwood
